div.p: HoneyCo is a small company started by 4 friends as a university project and is located in the beautiful city of Kuching, Malaysia.

a.style: background-color:black;color:white;text-decoration:none;padding:4px 6px;font-family:-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "San Francisco", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Ubuntu, Roboto, Noto, "Segoe UI", Arial, sans-serif;font-size:12px;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.2;display:inline-block;border-radius:3px
a.title: Download free do whatever you want high-resolution photos from Isaac Smith

div.p: Our goal is to provide the people of Kuching with the best quality and premium honey and raise awareness about bees.

a.style: background-color:black;color:white;text-decoration:none;padding:4px 6px;font-family:-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "San Francisco", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Ubuntu, Roboto, Noto, "Segoe UI", Arial, sans-serif;font-size:12px;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.2;display:inline-block;border-radius:3px
a.title: Download free do whatever you want high-resolution photos from Bee Naturalles

div.p: Our product is 100% pure and organic, we have over 30 bee hives as of today and 2.4million happy bees working for us. Our Honey is tested in our certified laboratories daily to ensure the highest of quality so that our customers are always satisfied.

Our Manuka MGO (methylglyoxal) Honey is made from the most premium honey and it has deep rich dark color and it also has long been believe and used to help with a variety of different alignments such as healing wounds, soothing sore throats and with digestive problems. Its also contains natural enzymes and antioxidants. MGO is a globally recognised measure of antibacterial activity. Our company use this proven measurement methodology to grade and verify the actual MGO activity of each batch using independent testing at NATA accredited laboratories. Higher MGO means the honey is more healthy. (MGO)
It is prefect as an additive for foods and drinks, or it can be eaten straight from the jar (we recommend between 1-3 spoons daily). Don't just take our word for it, try it and you will know why Manuka Honey is so popular. Our company have come out with 4 types of Manuka Honey with different MGO levels. Our Manuka Honey are only available in jars with 500g. (Simply Honey)

Bee pollen is a complete food and contains many elemants that products of animal origin do not possess. It is more rich in proteins and amino acids than any animal source such as beef, eggs, or cheese. Half of its proteins are in form of amino acids that are ready to be used directly by our body. One teaspoon of pollen takes one bee working eight hours a day for one month to gather. This is the reason why pollen is more expensive than honey.(Bee Pollen)
Bee Pollen can :

Our honeycomb products comes from all-natural honeycomb thatâ€™s cut straight from the hive. Much like honey, honeycombs contain essential fatty acids, antioxidants and other nutrients that are beneficial for overall health. Aside from being a good source of helpful nutrients, honeycombs are perfect snacks and can be added to foods and drinks. Source: ( www.natonic.com.au)

ul.li: Honeycombs are perfectly healthy and filling snack!
Contains natural antioxidants and fatty acids.
Can serve as an alternative for a nutrient-rich healthy snack.

div.p: Our Creamy Honey comes from 100% pure organic honey that has been processed to control crystallization. Due to this formation of tiny crystals it gives the honey a creamy and smooth texture, perfect for a spread or used as an alternative to sugar in drinks. Even though it is called creamed, our creamy honey contains no dairy products. (www.pastitli.com)

ul.li: Perfect for a spread or alternative to sugar.
Contains over 140 nutritional compunds, including vitamins, minerals, antioxidants and proteins.
Helps in the healing and repair of skin.

div.p: Our Honey Cocoa products are unique honey chocolate bars consist of five nutrient-rich ingredients. Each flavour comes with its unique taste based on the amount of raw organic honey, unrefined coconut oil, cocoa powder, Himalayan pink salt and Ingredients of the Flavour. The ingredients are 100% guaranteed from highest quality direct-trade. The Honey Cocoa bars does not contain soy, eggs, dairy, gluten, and grains (www.honeymamas.com)

ul.li: Healthy treats that helps maintain the immune system
Contains healthy fats from the unrefined coconut oil
Elegant and Delicate chocolate-truffle-like Honey Cocoa bars
Pure rich and delicious taste that comforts consumer's taste buds
